name: Stickman Fighter vs Ninja Shooter-Make Them Fight
name_original: Stickman Fighter vs Ninja Shooter-Make Them Fight
description:
This is a fight game for everyone !!

It's very easy to understand ,no complicated instruction - just make sure you smash the incoming object and you can play the game perfectly!

The challenge comes when you there are several layers where you need to hit the objects simultaneously, but this is one beautiful challenge because this is what makes the game classic!
